com.google.gwt.dev.codeserver
Class CodeServer

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.dev.codeserver.CodeServer

public class CodeServer
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the main method that starts the code server for "Super Dev Mode", a replacement for developer mode that doesn't require browser plugins.

This tool is EXPERIMENTAL. There is no authentication, no encryption, no XSS protection, and it makes all source code on the GWT compiler's classpath available via HTTP. It is only safe to run on localhost (the default).

args - Command-line options that can be parsed by Options.

main

public static void main(Options options)
Starts the code server with the given options. Shuts down the JVM if startup fails.

start

public static WebServer start(Options options)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              UnableToCompleteException
Starts the code server with the given command line options. To shut it down, see WebServer.stop().

Only one code server should be started at a time because the GWT compiler uses a lot of static variables.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
UnableToCompleteException
